resources.string: Aza mbeɗa slera AltGr antara Ctrl+Alt

resources.string: Zlálávan hardware keyaha an mtsa ba seke ko mar gé keyaha

string.name: koCheckForUpdates

string.name: koTestKeymanFunctioning

resources.string: Gé gwadanahe applications na ɓáaka a jemhe an Keyman ma seke fantufe slera

string.comment: OSK options - Releases shift/ctrl/alt on OSK after key press

resources.string: Ká ɓilanahe Shift/Ctrl/Alt on am sikirin Keyboard ma seke piyakana-piya key ŋanna

string.name: koAutoOpenOSK

resources.string: A nja a ban kwa Keyboard Window at sikirine ma seke an ksa Keyman keyboard ŋanna gé slera

string.name: koAutoSwitchOSKPages

resources.string: Magamaga Switch a dem kalkale sikirin Keyboard/anuga mla ma seke ksanta-ksande keyboard ŋanna

string.name: SKChangeHotkeyTitle
string.comment: Change Hotkey dialog title

string.name: SKSetHotkey_Language
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - message when setting hotkey for a language

resources.string: Ksante-ksa hotkey mtu ksa \'Custom\' antara ká ŋannahe Ctrl,Shift antara/mtu Alt antara ká piyanahe jiba hotkey ká kátá naka naza nare ŋa %1$s:

string.name: SKSetHotkey_Interface
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - message displayed when changing a hotkey for a product feature (e.g. show menu or show on screen keyboard)

resources.string: Ksante-ksa hotkey mtu ksa \'Custom\' antara ká ŋannahe Ctrl,Shift antara/mtu Alt antara ká piyanahe jiba hotkey ká kátá naka:

string.name: SKUnsafeHotkey
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with standard keyboard use

resources.string: Hotkey ŋanna %1$s a magavka kalkale antara mazla Keyboard ŋanna. Mmaga slera seke an Ctrl or Alt. Ká kátáhe mbeɗa una ŋanna akina\?

string.name: SKHotkeyConflicts_Keyboard
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with hotkey for another keyboard

resources.string: Hotkey ŋanna %1$s a magavka kalkale antara mazla Keyboard ŋanna %2$s. Ma seke ká ba maga slera an hotkey gé keyboard %2$s anuga kya digashe. Ba ká maga adaliya\?

string.name: SKHotkeyConflicts_Interface
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with hotkey for another interface hotkey

resources.string: Gé hotkey %1$s a magavka an hotkey umbulé ŋanna. Ma seke ka naba maga ne dem katafke, anuga kiɗa umbula hotkey ŋanna. Mmaga a dem katafke \?

string.name: HintTitle_KH_EXITPRODUCT
string.comment: Hint - dialog title upon attempting to exit product

string.name: Hint_KH_EXITPRODUCT

resources.string: Ba jirahe ká kátá shigashe am Keyman\? Keyman keyboards ŋa a de ba aŋkwa naraha Windows, amma a de ɓáaka a fantu slera sey ma fantufe Keyman adaliya.

string.comment: OSK right-click menu - show/hide OSK toolbar

string.comment: OSK right-click menu - save diagram of active keyboard layout as a web page

string.name: SKApplicationTitle
string.comment: Product name used for the title of message boxes and message dialogs

string.name: SKSplashVersion
string.comment: Version number

string.name: SKButtonPrint
string.comment: Print button in Welcome dialog for keyboards

string.name: SKPackageAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Notice during package installation that a package with the same name is already installed.

resources.string: Pakeji antara zhere %1$s aŋkwa an fa. Ká kátáhe ɗyanhe femhe una ŋanna antara femhe daula ne\?

string.name: SKKeyboardAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Notice during keyboard layout installation that a keyboard layout with the same name is already installed.

resources.string: Keyboard antara zhera ne \'%1$s\' aŋkwa an fa. ma seke fakarfe a dem katafke, anuga tiɗa erwa ŋanna kabu a fa daula ne ŋanna. ksakarksahe\?

string.name: SKKeyboardPartOfPackage
string.comment: Notice of need to uninstall an entire package

resources.string: Keyboard \'%1$s\' ŋane a ba atakwan pakeji \'%2$s\'. Sey ma tiɗakse-tiɗe baɗumma pakeji ŋanna. Ksakarksahe\?

string.name: SKInstallLanguageTransientLimit
string.comment: Message shown when Keyman is unable to install a Windows language for a keyboard

resources.string: A magavka femhe keyboard nare ŋanna; Windows aŋkwa zlaktane 4 custom \'transient\' naraha, antara matake shakanashe zlaktane gé magave.

string.name: SKPackageDoesNotIncludeWelcome
string.comment: Notice of lack of introductory help

resources.string: Pakeji ŋanna mtu keyboard \'%1$s\' janemka antara duksá mla zuŋŋwire.

string.name: SKOSNotSupported
string.comment: Notice of unsupported operating system

resources.string: Ɓáaka ga slera am jiba una gé operating system.

string.name: SKOnlineHelpFile
string.comment: File name of the help file - must be .chm format. The locale folder will be checked first for the file

string.name: SKCouldNotFindHelp
string.comment: Notice of help file not found

string.name: SKANSIEncoding
string.comment: Keyboard with an ANSI or Codepage encoding

string.name: SKUnicodeEncoding
string.comment: Keyboard with a Unicode encoding

string.name: SKDownloadProgress_Title
string.comment: Notice of file downloading

string.name: SKUninstallOnScreenKeyboard
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall OSK for a keyboard layout

resources.string: Ba jirahe ká kátá tiɗa keyboard sikirine na an fa na %1$s\?

string.name: SKUninstallKeyboard
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall keyboard layout

resources.string: Ba jirahe ká kátá femhe keyboard %1$s\?

string.name: SKUninstallPackage
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall a package

resources.string: Ba jirahe ká kátá femhe pakeji %1$s\?\n\n%2$s

string.name: SKUninstallPackageFonts
string.comment: Text embedded in SKUninstallPackage when fonts are ready for uninstall.

resources.string: Una gé mazlaha fonts kini anuga a de tiɗa ashigashe: %1$s.

string.name: SKUnicodeData_Build
string.comment: Request to build Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: Karakta Map an database gé karakta a kátá kaɓana nde kabu a fantu maga slera. Kaɓana-kaɓa akina\?

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseCouldNotBeDeleted
string.comment: Error deleting Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: Unicode Karakta database at gaggaka nde gé kaɓanahe adaliya. Baɗumma bayani kuskure ŋane: %1$s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_CouldNotCreateDatabase
string.comment: Error creating Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: Unicode Karakta database at magavka antara janfuje nde maga slera. Baɗumma bayani kuskure itare: %1$s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseLoadFailedRebuild
string.comment: Error loading Unicode Character Map database. Request to rebuild.

resources.string: Unicode karakta database ɗalatika ɗumme shagera (%1$s). Kaɓana-kaɓa adaliya akina\?

string.name: SKCannotStartProduct
string.comment: Error from Keyman failing to start keyman.exe due to an access denied or file not found

resources.string:
Keyman kwala-kwale fantu. Tazlaŋa zharana-zhara saitin program keyman.exe a fantuhe kabu a fantufe maga slera ŋanna.kuskure ŋane sasa:

"%1$s"

Ká kátáhe gwadanahe adaliya antara fantu Keyman ŋanna adaliya akina\?

string.name: SKDebuggingWarning
string.comment: Warning upon starting debugging in the Options tab

resources.string:
Keyman debug labare ŋanna anuga a de puwa am log file a ɗavan %LOCALAPPDATA%\Keyman\Diag\system#.etl (where # is a number). Ká nuga shigashe am Keyman kabu ká gwada gagga file.

\WARNING: File ŋanna anuga nye ba ƴaike a ba at watsire. Magave debugging anaba gulla maga slera system antara sawari a sawa aza nda technical support.

PRIVACY WARNING: Tazlaŋa diyasdiya gé kini debug logfile a maga rakodini baɗumma keystrokes ŋanna ká vinda ká. Ká kunna debug log gé naza lokte debugging mtu diagnostic session.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_PleaseWait
string.comment: OSK Font helper message

resources.string: Tazlaŋa páká gé naza lokte cekwa a ɗatsa fonts harzhe an keyboard ŋanna %1$s

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_NonUnicode
string.comment: OSK Font helper non-Unicode keyboard

resources.string: Keyboard %1$s ŋanenka Unicode keyboard. Fonts a tá shantika nde paɗare ba estuwa. Tazlaŋa zharana-zhara bayani at kaɗkaɗe keyboard aɗaba labare font ŋanna.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_NoKeyboards
string.comment: OSK Font helper no keyboards

resources.string: Ɓáaka ndra keyboard akina an fa mtu an burha.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_ChooseKeyboard
string.comment: OSK Font helper choose keyboard

resources.string: Tazlaŋa ksa Keyman keyboard gé shante jiba fonts ŋanna.

string.name: SKTextEditorCaption
string.comment: Caption of Text Editor
